name: Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent cannot connect to the ResourceManager URI to collect metrics, otherwise `OK`.

name: Yarn Application Status
description: By default, returns `OK` if the Yarn application state is `NEW`, `NEW_SAVING`, `SUBMITTED`, `ACCEPTED`, `RUNNING`, or `FINISHED`; `UNKNOWN` if the application state is `ALL`; and `CRITICAL` if the Yarn application state is `FAILED` or `KILLED`.
